name: ddb-putitem-1KiB-latency-benchmark
description: DynamoDB PutItem latency benchmark - measures SDK latency for write operations executed sequentially.

actionConfig.description: Each item has a string partition key 'pk' (format: '<keyPrefix><index>') and a binary attribute 'data' with <dataLength> bytes of String type data.

batch.description: A batch is 1,000 PutItem actions executed sequentially
